pages.text: Dinofelis wander the warm landscapes of the Overworld. If TFC is installed, you can find Dinofelis in the same areas as TFC Sabertooths. $(br2)Dinofelis can be tamed much like wolves and be ridden without a saddle. $(br2)When tamed and in wander mode, they will hunt other animals.

When tamed, they can carry their owner. They can be sat down/ up by shift-left-clicking them, and put to Follow/ Wander mode by shift-right-clicking.  $(br2)Be careful, as they'll attack players on-sight. Tame them as fast as possible! $(br2)Dinofelis enjoy Raw Meat and Fish.
